group_1.narration: The final moments of these Magical Girls,@and the hope they entrusted to me.
The memories of those involved are inscribed here,@along with their thoughts and emotions.
That's why I think this inherited hope deserves@more than what someone like me can provide.
Tsuruno, Sana, help her find atonement.

group_1.textCenter: I thought that everyone in the Mizuna Clan and@the Taito Gang could build a better Soma.
It was my fault for being filled with despair@and suspicion.
It had nothing to do with the Mizuna Clan,@the Taito Gang, or our parents.
All I had to do was believe in Chizuru.
It should have been a brand new country@founded by our generation...
As I sink into the darkness like this,@I feel guilty about Tsuruno and Sana...
They went through all that trouble to forge a@connection between Chizuru and me...
However, it's too late to have regrets.
It's a small atonement, but I shall entrust@my hope to the future.
Because that's all I can do now.
